news.markdown:
**BRAND NEW SHOW!** 

We are currently in creation for our new work  _Lovely Girls_ which will preview 7th/8th November at The Wardrobe Theatre in Bristol. Tickets are on Sale now along with tickets for our open Level Workshop @ The Wardrobe Theatre, 7th November. Space are limited so book yours now!
news.html:
BRAND NEW SHOW!

We are currently in creation for our new work Lovely Girls which will preview 7th/8th November at The Wardrobe Theatre in Bristol. Tickets are on Sale now along with tickets for our open Level Workshop @ The Wardrobe Theatre, 7th November. Space are limited so book yours now!

_More performance dates to be announced soon, stay tuned!_
